items.name: Golden Tiger Roll Sushi
items.description: The Golden Tiger Roll is a decadent sushi roll filled with crispy shrimp tempura, creamy avocado, and often cream cheese, then topped with spicy crab, drizzled with spicy mayo and eel sauce, and finished with a crunchy, flavorful garnish.

items.name: Smoky Bourbon BBQ Burgerdd
items.description: Sink your teeth into a juicy, perfectly grilled beef patty glazed with a rich smoky bourbon BBQ sauce. Topped with melted cheddar, crispy onion rings, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomatoes, all sandwiched between a toasted brioche bun. Every bite delivers a smoky, tangy, and slightly sweet flavor explosion that’s irresistible for burger lovers.

items.name: Smoky Bourbon BBQ Burgerdd
items.description: Sink your teeth into a juicy, perfectly grilled beef patty glazed with a rich smoky bourbon BBQ sauce. Topped with melted cheddar, crispy onion rings, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomatoes, all sandwiched between a toasted brioche bun. Every bite delivers a smoky, tangy, and slightly sweet flavor explosion that’s irresistible for burger lovers.

product.name: Midnight Margherita
product.description: A perfect blend of simplicity and flavor, this pizza features a golden, thin-crust base topped with rich tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and fragrant basil leaves. Baked to perfection, its melty cheese and aromatic herbs create a comforting, classic taste that’s perfect for late-night cravings.

product.name: Smoky Bourbon BBQ Burgerdd
product.description: Sink your teeth into a juicy, perfectly grilled beef patty glazed with a rich smoky bourbon BBQ sauce. Topped with melted cheddar, crispy onion rings, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomatoes, all sandwiched between a toasted brioche bun. product.name: Golden Tiger Roll Sushi
product.description: The Golden Tiger Roll is a decadent sushi roll filled with crispy shrimp tempura, creamy avocado, and often cream cheese, then topped with spicy crab, drizzled with spicy mayo and eel sauce, and finished with a crunchy, flavorful garnish.

product.name: Saffron Butter Prawns
product.description: Succulent prawns gently sautéed in a rich saffron-infused butter sauce, finished with a touch of cream and aromatic spices

product.name: Paneer Tikka Masala Deluxe
product.description: Char-grilled cubes of marinated paneer simmered in a luxurious, spiced tomato-cream gravy with peppers, onions, and aromatic herbs

product.name: Lemon Garlic Butter Salmon
product.description: Fresh salmon fillet pan-seared and finished in a silky lemon-garlic butter sauce, accented with herbs for a bright, melt-in-the-mouth flavor.

product.name: Wild Mushroom Risotto
product.description: Creamy Arborio rice slowly cooked with a medley of wild mushrooms, finished with Parmesan, fresh herbs and a drizzle of truffle oil.

product.name: Pistachio Rose Delight
product.description: A delicate fusion of creamy pistachio and fragrant rose, layered into a luscious dessert finished with nuts and a hint of sweetness.

product.name: Spicy Volcano Maki
product.description: A fiery sushi roll packed with spicy tuna and avocado, topped with a baked creamy seafood mix and drizzled with tangy volcano sauce for a bold, erupting flavor.

product.name: Kung Pao Chicken
product.description: A flavorful stir-fry dish made with tender chicken, roasted peanuts, bell peppers, and dried chilies, all tossed in a tangy, spicy soy-based sauce.

product.name: Sweet and Sour Pork
product.description: Crispy fried pork chunks coated in a vibrant sweet and sour sauce, made with pineapples, bell peppers, and a tangy vinegar-based sauce.

product.name: Dim Sum Platter
product.description: A variety of bite-sized Chinese dumplings, buns, and spring rolls, steamed or fried, served with dipping sauces.

product.name: Mapo Tofu
product.description: Silken tofu cooked in a spicy, flavorful Sichuan sauce with minced pork, chili oil, and a hint of garlic, served over rice.

product.name: Cheesy Garlic Bread Combo
product.description: Get 2 cheesy garlic breads + free dip at a special offer price.

product.name: Burger + Fries + Coke
product.description: Enjoy a full combo meal with burger, fries, and Coke at a discounted price.

product.name: Family Pizza Pack
product.description: 2 large pizzas + 1 garlic bread + 2 soft drinks — perfect for family dining.

product.name: Burger Combo Feast
product.description: Cheese burger + fries + cold drink at a combo price.

product.name: Grilled Chicken Meal
product.description: Juicy grilled chicken with rice and salad at a special price.

product.name: Vegetarian Thali Offer
product.description: Traditional Indian thali with chapati, curry, rice, and dessert.

product.name: Shawarma Wrap Deal
product.description: 2 chicken shawarma wraps with a soft drink included.

product.name: Ice Cream Sundae Treat
product.description: Buy 1 sundae and get 1 free. Perfect for dessert lovers.

product.name: Biryani Family Pack
product.description: Family-sized chicken biryani with raita and salad.
